queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ab__dotd` ( `promotion_id` mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `filter` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `use_products_filter` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y', `hide_products_block` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `use_schedule` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `ab__dotd_schedule` text, PRIMARY KEY (`promotion_id`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=UTF8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ab__dotd_descriptions` ( `promotion_id` mediumint(8) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `h1` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `page_title` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `meta_description` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `meta_keywords` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`promotion_id`,`lang_code`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=UTF8;
REPLACE INTO ?:privileges (privilege, is_default, section_id, group_id, is_view) VALUES ('ab__dotd_view_seodata', 'Y', 'ab__addons', 'ab__deal_of_the_day', 'Y')
